languages.text: "Арбитес выносят приговор и приводят его в исполнение на месте. Только высшие чины {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Терры{/g} и служители Инквизиции могут рассчитывать на привилегию суда, а в Просторе — Вольные Торговцы. Планетарные губернаторы, знать, духовенство — для арбитров все они равны перед законом".

"The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес выносят приговор и приводят его в исполнение на месте. Только высшие чины {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Терры{/g} и служители Инквизиции могут рассчитывать на привилегию суда, а в Просторе — Вольные Торговцы. Планетарные губернаторы, знать, духовенство — для арбитров все они равны перед законом".

traits.locale_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of Terra and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect to receive the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

"The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

languages.text: 「高等裁定局は判決を下し、その場で即座に執行します。裁判という特権を期待できるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}地球{/g}の最高権力層と異端審問庁の役人、そしてこのエクスパンスにいるローグトレーダーだけです。惑星総督も、貴族も、聖職者も―アービトレイターにとっては、法の下ですべて平等です」
languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局は判決を下し、その場で即座に執行します。裁判という特権を期待できるのは、地球の最高権力層と異端審問庁の役人、そしてこのエクスパンスにいるローグトレーダーだけです。惑星総督も、貴族も、聖職者も―アービトレイターにとっては、法の下ですべて平等です」

languages.text: "Das Arbites verkündet das Strafmaß und vollstreckt es. Nur die höchsten Kreise von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} und Diener der Inquisition – sowie Freihändler hier in der Ausdehnung – können mit dem Privileg eines Prozesses rechnen. Gouverneure von Planeten, Adel, Klerus – für einen Arbitrator sind sie vor dem Gesetz alle gleich."
languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

traits.locale_text: "Das Arbites verkündet das Strafmaß und vollstreckt es. Nur die höchsten Kreise von Terra und Diener der Inquisition – sowie Freihändler hier in der Ausdehnung – können mit dem Privileg eines Prozesses rechnen. Gouverneure von Planeten, Adel, Klerus – für einen Arbitrator sind sie vor dem Gesetz alle gleich."

languages.text: « L'Arbites prononce la sentence et se charge de son exécution sommaire. Seuls les individus les plus haut placés de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} et les serviteurs de l'Inquisition, ainsi que les libres-marchands dans les Étendues, sont en droit de réclamer le privilège d'un jugement. Qu'ils soient gouverneurs planétaires, nobles ou membres du clergé... Aux yeux d'un arbitrator, tous sont égaux devant la loi.
languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

traits.locale_text: « L'Arbites prononce la sentence et se charge de son exécution sommaire. Seuls les individus les plus haut placés de Terra et les serviteurs de l'Inquisition, ainsi que les libres-marchands dans les Étendues, sont en droit de réclamer le privilège d'un jugement. Qu'ils soient gouverneurs planétaires, nobles ou membres du clergé... Aux yeux d'un arbitrator, tous sont égaux devant la loi.

languages.text: «El Arbites dicta sentencia y la ejecuta sumariamente. Solo los estamentos más altos de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} y los siervos de la Inquisición, como los Comerciantes Independientes aquí en la Extensión, gozan del privilegio de un proceso judicial. Los gobernadores planetarios, la nobleza, el clero... para un Arbitrator todos son iguales ante la ley».
languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

traits.locale_text: «El Arbites dicta sentencia y la ejecuta sumariamente. Solo los estamentos más altos de Terra y los siervos de la Inquisición, como los Comerciantes Independientes aquí en la Extensión, gozan del privilegio de un proceso judicial. Los gobernadores planetarios, la nobleza, el clero... para un Arbitrator todos son iguales ante la ley».

languages.text: “法务部负责审判犯人，迅速执行判决。只有{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}神圣泰拉{/g}最高层的成员、审判庭的成员，以及各个星区的行商浪人，才能享受获得审判的特权。至于众多行星上的总督、贵族、神职人员，这些人在法律面前一律平等，在法务官眼里没有任何区别。”
languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

traits.locale_text: “法务部负责审判犯人，迅速执行判决。只有神圣泰拉最高层的成员、审判庭的成员，以及各个星区的行商浪人，才能享受获得审判的特权。至于众多行星上的总督、贵族、神职人员，这些人在法律面前一律平等，在法务官眼里没有任何区别。”

languages.text: "Arbites, ceza hükmünü verir ve derhâl infaz eder. Yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}'nın en yüksek mercileri, Engizisyon'un hizmetkârları ve burada Enginlik'teki Hür Tacirler duruşma ayrıcalığına sahip olabilir. Gezegen valileri, soylular, din adamları... Hepsi de bir Yargıcı'nın önünde eşittir."
languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Only the highest echelons of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} and servants of the Inquisition — and Rogue Traders here in the Expanse — can expect the privilege of a trial. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."

traits.locale_text: "Arbites, ceza hükmünü verir ve derhâl infaz eder. Yalnızca Terra'nın en yüksek mercileri, Engizisyon'un hizmetkârları ve burada Enginlik'teki Hür Tacirler duruşma ayrıcalığına sahip olabilir. Gezegen valileri, soylular, din adamları... Hepsi de bir Yargıcı'nın önünde eşittir."

languages.original_text: "The Arbites pass the sentence and carry it out summarily. Planetary governors, nobility, clergy — to an Arbitrator, they are all equal before the law."
